entry.tran: （与名词和动词连用构成形容词）表示“防…的”，“抗…的”
entry.def: -proof combines with nouns and verbs to form adjectives which indicate that something cannot be damaged or badly affected by the thing or action mentioned.

example.ex: In a large microwave-proof dish, melt butter for 20 seconds.
example.tran: 让黄油在微波适用的大盘子里熔化20秒钟。

entry.tran: （和名词一起构成动词）表示“防…”，“抗…”
entry.def: -proof combines with nouns to form verbs which refer to protecting something against being damaged or badly affected by the thing mentioned.

example.ex: ...home energy efficiency grants towards the cost of draught-proofing your home.
example.tran: 用于居室防风的家庭节能资金
不受通货膨胀影响的养老金
